Room.Name: Sewage Pit
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a pit half-filled with human excrement.
Room.LongDescription: Not only does it stink here, but the bite of the flys is drawing blood. Directly overhead is a closed trap door which you fell through, and can- not go back into. Looks like the only way out is to slog through the shit and climb out from underneath the wagon. Better hurry though, there really isn't much oxygen down here.
